content: Dig through sod and roots like a hot knife through butter by going in with the garden root slayer shovel. It features a comfortable ergonomic o-grip handle to prevent slipping along with a sharpened v-blade tip with rip saw teeth – eliminating the need for hatchets and saws.

Have everyone at the game table on the edge of their seats the entire night by playing the Suspend hanging balance game. Players take turn hanging the notched, rubber-tipped wire pieces from the tabletop stand onto the main structure without knocking it down.

Take your BBQ game up a notch by cooking your already mouthwatering slabs of meat on this 3-tier plank holder. The design allows you to comfortably cook multiple dishes at once while infusing your food with subtle flavors of smoked cedar.

Give your GoT watch party a boozy twist by popping open a few of these Game of Thrones wines. The bottles feature exquisitely designed themed labels and come in a pack that includes three limited edition bottles: cabernet, red blend, and chardonnay.

Keep a watchful eye over your home even when you’re not around by installing this light bulb hidden camera. It requires no special wiring or drilling to install, and comes with a small night vision camera that can stream live HD video straight to your smartphone.

Keep the memory of your loved one around long after they’re gone by placing their remains in this human ashes tree planter urn. This biodegradable urn turns the death process into a transformative experience as you watch the tree blossom to maturity.

titleEN: How To Be A Person In The World
content: Learn to navigate the paradoxes of the modern world by reading How To Be A Person In The World. In this captivating read, advice columnist Heather Havrilesky shares her vast wisdom on various subjects to remind you that even in your darkest moments you’re not alone.

Celebrate Frank Lloyd Wright’s vision and unique architectural style by building your very own miniature version of the Guggenheim Museum with this LEGO set. The completed model stands at 4 inches and makes a great gift for any New Yorker or architecture fan.

Add an amusing touch to your reading nook by propping up your literary collection using this falling books bookend. It’s crafted from metal and cleverly designed to create the illusion that your stack of books is about to fall over and crush the tiny people making a run for it.

Add a geeky touch to your tropical fiesta with these Star Wars tiki cups. Each ceramic mug features a 14 ounce capacity and is available in 1 of 6 character designs including Darth Vader, Boba Fett, Chewbacca, and Yoda.

Enjoy the outdoors while still maintaining a modern interior space with this unique bubble tent. The bubble’s large size allows you to decorate as you see fit and transform a little piece of nature into your private sanctuary of peace and tranquility, minus the insects.

Never drink tea alone again with this baby Nessie tea infuser by your side. Apart from serving as your drinking buddy, baby Nessie’s porous body will release the tea into your mug while his long neck extends above the water’s surface so that you can stir it.

titleEN: You Shall Not Pass Car Sticker
content: Keep drivers from cutting you off on the road with the help of Gandalf and the “You Shall Not Pass” car sticker. This amusing vinyl decal is made to stand up to the elements and comes available in whatever color tickles your fancy. Slow down, you fools!

Elevate your favorite drinking game to new heights as you mercilessly punish your liver playing mountain beer pong. In addition to the standard six cup base, it incorporates a multilevel cup holder that increases the difficulty and fun of this iconic drinking game.

Rule the office with an iron fist by keeping employees in line with the rubber band machine gun. Handcrafted from solid maple, it’s modeled after the MP5 sub-machine gun and is capable of firing up to 24 rubber bands at distances up to 30 feet.

Unleash the power of your iPhone’s camera using the Pictar camera-grip. After easily sliding your phone into the camera-grip, you’ll have full access to features like a zoom ring, a selfie button, and most importantly a shutter button with a “half press” mode.

Make the jump to light speed with this Star Wars vehicle sun reflector. This incredibly geeky accordion style sun reflector is the perfect way to protect your  Millennium Falcon’s interior from small asteroids and merciless UV rays.

Cook your juicy slabs of meat to perfection inside this pig shaped wood fired grill. Styled like a plump piggy, this wood burning steel grill’s ample cylindrical body can easily fit up to 16 burgers, 4 chickens, 24 hot dogs, and 5 mouthwatering rib racks.

Get one step closer to having your place look like Monica and Rachel’s with this Friends yellow peephole frame replica. The whimsical design and bright color complement any door, making this an ideal gift for any fan of the iconic show.

titleEN: Science Flask Salt and Pepper Shakers
content: Give your kitchen a geeky twist by storing your salt and pepper in these scientific flask shakers. These four inch tall Erlenmeyer flask containers are equipped with a periodic table styled label and a black rubber stopper to prevent the salt and pepper from spilling.

Shine like never before by accenting your outfit with these eye-catching interactive LED eyelashes. These high-tech accessories bring your dull lashes to the forefront by allowing you to alter the effect and color of your electronic lashes.

Keep all your essentials handy while you’re soaking up some rays by outfitting your chair with this pool chair towel organizer. It’s made from ultra-absorbent and fast-drying microfiber and is aligned with multiple pockets to store everything from sunglasses to a book.

Experience your favorite games in a whole new light with the Samsung 49″ curved gaming monitor. Equivalent to two side by side 16:9 monitors, this giant 32:9 super ultra-wide screen allows for seamless multitasking along with a rapid 144Hz refresh rate.

Transform your barren yard into a lush and vibrant garden using these seeding squares. Ideal for any size yard, each of these compact modular squares provides you with the optimal setting for growing a variety of plants and veggies with minimal weeds.

Give any treat a sweet and savory kick by dousing it with some coffee infused maple syrup. Handmade with real maple syrup from the Catskill Mountains, it has subtle hints of toffee, chocolate, cherry, and fudge – making it the ideal topping for just about anything.

Keep your precious bundle of joy from driving you absolutely mad by soothing him/her using this incredible baby shushing device. The device emits a rhythmic “shushing” sound that is designed to sooth and calm your fussy baby.

Keep beverages chilled without having to rely on electricity or ice by storing your drinks inside this underground beer cooler.  The long cylindrical shape burrows into the ground to hide your drinks from the hot sun while insulating using the Earth’s natural temp.

Build delicious structures of colors and calories by using these LEGO silicone molds. By filling up the different shaped molds, you can create dozens of small LEGO themed gummy candy bricks and action figures that everyone will love.

Fulfill your dream of becoming a mythical woodland creature with help from this creepy unicorn mask.  It’s so realistically styled that from the moment you put it on, you and everyone lucky enough to come into your presence will undoubtedly be touched by its magic.

One-up MacGyver by turning common materials into crafty contraptions with help from the Rubber Band Engineer book. This compelling read will turn you into a master tinkerer – showing you how to craft items like catapults and slingshot rockets.

Give your friend a good laugh for their birthday by placing their gift inside this prank earwax candle kit box. This highly realistic printed box conceals your actual gift in what looks like a ridiculous item meant to extract earwax to create truly unique candles.

Streamline your shaving routine by spreading a nice even layer of shaving cream using this can brush adapter. It fits over the top of any pressure based shaving cream/gel can – keeping your hands foam free while reducing the amount of shaving cream used.

Smash your way through virtually any obstacle you encounter using the sledgehammer battering ram. The inventive design incorporates multiple tools into a simple and incredibly versatile package that you can carry with ease.

Stimulate your pooch’s intellect with help from this dog puzzle feeder.  Created by neuroscientists, this clever feeding system engages and challenges your dog with a series of adaptive puzzles designed to keep your dog entertained and mentally stimulated.

Bring all the fun of a carnival to your backyard pool with this water shooter pool toy. You and a friend will go head to head armed with endlessly supplied water pistols, firing away to see who can manage to knock all the balls out of their tube first.

Ever wish you could cool off with pickle juice? Well then feast your eyes on these pickle flavored ice pops! These refreshing treats feature a delightful zesty pickle taste and are packed with essential minerals like potassium and calcium to promote a balanced body.

Give your skin the royal treatment by lathering it up with these beer soaps. They come in six incredible varieties including “hoppy IPA” and “vanilla porter” – and are made from quality ingredients like orange peel, crushed, oats, and real hops.

Guarantee your beverage remains inside its container no matter what by storing it inside the spillproof travel mug. This 16 ounce mug employs smart grip technology to make it impervious to accidental bumps, making it ideal to take on boats, picnics, or the beach.

Snapping the perfect photo of your furry friend is easier than ever with this treat holder phone attachment. The device easily clips to the top of your smartphone so that you can dandle a delicious treat and get your pooch to look directly into the camera.

Keep track of all the genius ideas, fleeting thoughts,  and big questions that arise while flying high by writing them down in the How High Am I journal. This guided journal comes with a list of intriguing prompts and ample space to doodle and record your brilliant ideas.

This iPhone instant photo printer makes sharing your memories with friends and family easier than ever. This compact device fits over your smartphone – allowing you to easily print photos stored on your phone in as little as 30 seconds.

Bypass the knife and scalpel next time you need to remove the poison of a nasty sting using this bite and sting extractor kit. Simply place the device over the affected area and watch as the reusable vacuum pump efficiently sucks up all the toxins.

titleEN: Never Have I Ever Card Game
content: Coax the deepest and darkest secrets out from your inebriated friends by playing the “Never Have I Ever” card game. The classic drinking game is back and better than ever with hundreds of fun, provocative, and embarrassing questions just waiting to be asked.

Unleash delightful aromas into the air by lighting up this aromatherapy essential oil aroma diffuser. The lamp lights up in one of 6 vibrant colors and quietly diffuses a continuous stream of delightful scents throughout the entire room.

Keep your little furry friend warm and cozy while you relax by placing him inside the pet pouch hoodie. The sweater comes with a soft and snug kangaroo-like pouch that is designed for maximum comfort while you snuggle up with your best friend.

Bring order to your kitchen by keeping your tupperware neatly arranged with the adjustable pull-out container organizer. Designed for 18” and 24” base cabinets, it features a handy peg board floor design that allows you to customize the organizer to fit your needs.

The flying alarm clock is ideal for anyone who has a hard time getting up in the morning. When it’s time to wake up the rotor will begin spinning and the clock will fly around the room as it makes noise – forcing you to get out of bed if you ever hope to shut it off.

Weed out the lightweights in the room by putting everyone’s livers to the test with the Pass Out drinking board game. Players travel around the board while consuming copious amounts of good old alcohol. Last one standing wins – but even when you win, you lose.

Punish your anus and permanently stain your bed sheets by bravely sprinkling in some “Shit The Bed” hot sauce onto your meals. It’s loaded with Scorpion chillies – the 3rd hottest chili in the world – along with a blend of varied herbs and spices.

Avoid dinging your car when reversing out of a parking spot by outfitting your ride with this wireless car backup camera system. This waterproof infrared HD camera pivots 140 degrees left and right to capture wide angle views of what’s behind you when you’re backing up.

The Dynasty Toys laser tag set lets you transform any open area into the ultimate laser tag arena. They come in sets of two, feature a range of 120 feet, offer four exciting team settings, and have built-in targets that eliminate the need for vests.

Keep your clothes sweat-free on hot days by outfitting our ride with the cooling car seat. It is outfitted with a powerful intake fan that delivers cool air to 18 ventilation holes that help to absorb body heat and reduce perspiration.

Take some shooters from these hooters! Nothing goes down the hatch smoother than vanilla vodka shooting out of an ice luge except a delicious shot from a perfectly formed icy booby. It sounds too good to be true — but it is so, so true.

Teach your kid a strong work ethic at a young age with the baby mop onesie. Not only will your baby learn the importance of cleanliness, but he will also get an ab defining workout as he crawls across the floor picking up dirt and trash.

The world is a scary place and you should always carry protection – and with the DSLR camera condom you can protect your high end camera from just about everything. It’s perfect for snapping photos or video where the environment is less than hospitable.

Brighten up someone’s special day with a little wonder  by crafting a magic flying butterfly card. Simply insert this tiny rubber-band-powered butterfly into any greeting card and it’ll fly up to 20 feet in the air once the card is opened by the recipient.

Go from total noob to beer connoisseur by reading The Complete Beer Course book. This fascinating read is structured around a series of easy-to-follow courses that go over every type and style of beer, and even teaches you how to pair your brews with food.

Make Rex’s dry food a little more palatable by topping it off with these nutritional dog condiments. They feature a great taste and are made with natural and healthy ingredients in addition to 20 nutrients that include vitamins, minerals, and anti-oxidants.

Stay toasty while you grill up your meals on cold nights using the Blaze tower fire pit and grill. It sports a functional pyramid-like tower design that can be used as a handy fire pit, charcoal grill, conventional oven, or pizza oven to cook up meals the entire family will love.

Give pasta night an authentic touch by making your very own pasta with the Philips Viva pasta maker. It features a narrow space-saving design and automatically kneads and extrudes 2-3 servings of fresh pasta in just 18 minutes.

Diffuse any dangerous situation in seconds by electrocuting a would-be assailant using this one million volt stun gun. It sports a sturdy ergonomic design that makes it easy to handle and is capable of generating up to 1,000,000 volts of stopping power!

Upgrade your mobile workstation by plugging in the Asus Zenscreen portable USB monitor to your laptop or tablet. This 15.6 inch LCD monitor is compatible with USB Type-C and Type-A sources and weights just 1.7 pounds so you can easily carry it around.

Welcome to the future of grocery shopping. The magnetic Amazon Dash Wand is an Alexa enabled device that can help you scan grocery barcodes, convert measurements, and order household essentials from Amazon using just your voice!

Get the perfect tan as you sizzle like a pepperoni under the hot sun while laying out on the pizza towel. This oversized nearly five foot wide pizza comes loaded with melted cheese and greasy pepperoni – making it ideal for the beach or picnics.

Cultivate your favorite plants in mid-air using this revolutionary zero-gravity plant growing system. The geometrically themed planter floats directly above a sleek looking oak base through magnetic levitation to create an eye-catching sight.

Get smooth, icy cold hits every time by toking up with your very own homemade ice pipe. Using this mold you’ll be able to craft yourself a handy ice pipe that you can actually smoke from for about an hour before it melts away.

Experience your favorite action role-playing game like never before with Dark Souls: The Board Game. This strategically challenging game completely immerses you and up to 3 friends in non-stop action as you explore dangerous locations overflowing with enemies.

Mornings will never be the same once the ultimate breakfast machine enters your life. In just five minutes this glorious machine will make you a complete breakfast sandwich. It’s the delicious and cost effective way to clog your arteries from the comfort of home!

Give that sexy pool boy the boot by replacing him with this solar powered pool skimmer. After placing it in the water, it will float along the surface to remove up to 95% of all surface debris – including dust, leaves, pollen, and bacteria.

Serve up restaurant quality burgers right from home by making them using this 8-in-1 burger patty press. It allows you to easily make 8 plump quarter pound hexagonal patties that measure about 3 inches across and that are 1 inch thick.

Flood the pool with color and style by soaking up the sun on this vibrant rainbow pool float. It’s made from 25mm PVC and sports a comfy half circle design styled to look like a brightly colored rainbow – complete with all seven colors.

Take your drinking games from the frat house to the big leagues by upgrading to the moving beer pong robot. This motorized device holds up to 5 plastic red cups and moves all around the table – dramatically increasing the difficulty of the shot.

Add a new level of excitement and difficulty to game night by playing a rousing game of Tetris Jenga. Instead of simply stacking rectangular wooden blocks, players will take turns stacking Tetris shaped and colored pieces like the L, T, and Z blocks.

Push your creative boundaries by capturing amazing shots with the DJI Spark mini camera drone. This agile little drone comes with intelligent flight control options, a mechanical 2-axis gimbal, and incredible image quality captured by the onboard camera.

Drench the competition with a continuous stream of liquid punishment using the AK-47 water gun. Rather than having you waste precious energy pumping away, this water gun features a convenient motorized system that shoots water with just the pull of the trigger.

Transform your room into a serene underwater oasis with this relaxing waves projector. This compact device projects a flurry of vibrant and hypnotizing patterns designed to help you disconnect from the hectic world around you.

Give your tasty cocktails a stunning visual component using these smokey dry ice drink stirrers. Each stirrer is designed to hold food-safe dry ice that creates a billowing smoke cloud around the surface of your drink when inserted.

Make your little driver’s racing dreams come true by getting him behind the controls of the Sphero ultimate Lightning McQueen toy. This app-enabled drifting race car reaches top speeds of 6 miles per hour and responds to your commands with his signature wit.

Help meet your fitness goals by staying motivated and focused using this artificial intelligence personal trainer. The ergonomic design fits comfortably in your ears to provide you with a tailored fitness plan as well as real-time insights to improve workout efficiency.

Carry an entire three course meal in one hand at your next cookout using this food and beverage plate. It’s made from sturdy resin polypropylene and is designed to fit most cans and cups so that you can always have one hand free to stuff more food in your fat mouth.

The Que collapsible water bottle is the container that can shrink in size when needed without sacrificing style. Made from food-safe silicone, it features a unique spiral design that allows you to collapse the bottle to nearly half its size for easy portability.

Stave off boredom old school style with this 3D pin art toy. This wildly entertaining board measures just 5″ x 7″ and comes with dozens of tiny little metal pins that you push on one side to create a cool three dimensional sculpture on the other side.

Introduce some order to the mess that is your bathroom with the modular shower station. This station is the ultimate in bathroom accessories, it boasts a sturdy rust-proof metal frame, four sets of shelves, and hangs conveniently from the shower head.

Lock your home’s door with the signature weapon of the Jedi Order using these Star Wars lightsaber house keys. These geeky keys forgo the standard design in lieu of a fully detailed lightsaber that is available in stunning red, blue, purple, and green hues.

Give yourself a fighting chance during exams by with help from the cram session snack survival kit. It comes jam packed with over 24 cram session essentials like pens, pencils, index cards, and loads of sugary treats to keep you awake during those marathon sessions.

Work comfortably when you’re on location at a job site by bringing along the unfolding compact workbench. This lightweight table provides an ample working space of  46″ x 21.65″, can hold loads up to 1000 pounds, and folds into a compact suitcase for easy transport.

Amaze dinner guests with your culinary talents with help from Anthony Bourdain’s “Appetites: A Cookbook”. Anthony Bourdain boils down his decades of cooking and globe-trotting into a list of delicious dishes that everyone should know how to make.

Ensure your brews remain cold while you’re out at the tailgate by storing them inside this neoprene bottle holder. It accommodates up to 7 beers, is made entirely from neoprene to help keep drinks cool, and comes with a comfy handle for portability.

Ensure your phone remains in one piece while you’re slaying your workout by placing it inside this iPhone holding water bottle. This waterproof bottle comes with two separate compartments so that you can store your phone in one and your beverage in the other.

Get your caffeine fix even if there’s no time to brew a fresh pot by popping one of these dry brew coffee chews in your mouth. Equivalent to a six ounce cup of coffee, each little piece is made using real coffee, non-dairy creamer, and a zero-calorie sweetener.

Avoid accidentally starving your pooch by relying on this dog feeding daily reminder board. Constructed from high-impact ABS plastic, it’s easily mountable and comes with an “A.M.” and “P.M.” section that helps you keep track of things so you don’t overfeed Rex.

Relieve anxiety and stress by keeping your hands busy with this penny fidget spinner. It features a spin time of 3 to 5 minutes and sports a distinguished copper tone that complements the six “one cent” pennies inserted into the spinner.

Keep your feline friend entertained even when you’re not home by using this smartphone controlled interactive cat toy. It features a built-in camera so that you can see your kitty as you control a cat teaser using your smartphone.

Keep strangers from wanting to pet your doggy when you’re out on walks by transforming him into a mutant beast with this werewolf dog muzzle. It’s designed to fit your pup without causing discomfort and is intricately styled to make your dog look like a ravenous beast.

This 2-in-1 broom and squeegee lets you clean up wet & dry messes easily without having to switch between a mop and broom. The ingenious design allows you to single-handedly rotate between the broom and squeegee side of the head.

Enjoy the taste of your favorite brew without the accompanying hangover the next day by making one of these Soberdough beer bread mixes. Simply pour and blend your favorite beer into this all-natural mix, place it in the oven, and enjoy!

Give your car’s interior some comic book inspired charm with this “Fire Missiles” cigarette lighter button. This eye-catching accent is crafted from anodized aluminum and is designed to fit most 12-volt car sockets.

Control your lights and appliances from anywhere in the world by plugging them into this WiFi smart outlet plug adapter. It allows you to control any appliance plugged into the outlet using your smartphone so that you can switch it on and off even if you’re not home.

Stay prepared for whatever comes your way by bringing along this emergency survival backpack kit. This water resistant pack is ergonomically designed for both adults and children and features everything you may need during a survival situation.

Enjoy the fun and debauchery of alcohol without those nasty hangovers by getting shit-faced with this alcohol vaporizing pump. This calorie-free method of alcohol consumption lets you savor your spirit’s rich taste while eliminating the risk of hangovers the next day.
